content: i originally made this purse for a 2005 fiber arts class at the university of houston - clear lake and it makes a fun purse for a little girl or when made with less garish colors could even be a sweet party purse this little purse uses squares woven on a weave-it loom along with crocheted straps weave-it looms can be found on ebay and at flea markets or antique stores but newer versions of this type of loom can be found at buxton brook looms and hazel rose looms you can also crochet or knit 3 5 squares instead different weaving patterns can be found in several books and downloads you ll find links to these sites at the end of the instructions
